data.message: One day I'm going to write you a letter as long as a book to tell you how you changed my life for the good. Thank you, Eminem. I hope to  rap with as much of my heart as I imagine you do. You have helped me see I can be me with no apologies but when I've done harm for fruitless reasons. Peace and love to you, my brother from another mother.

replies.message: Emotional,,, he inspired the world 🌎
I wrote him him but he still ain't callin.
I hope you wrote your cell, pager and home phone at the bottom
Sarah Heimo *your

Yaniv Baigorria
חחחח מצוין התגובות לתגובה הזאת
Creep is your name stan😜😜😜😜🤢🤢🤢🤢
Anyways what's been up man how's your daughter?
Mike Laine Ortiz sorry you mad, bro. hope things work out for you.
Anyone vibing join my tribe.  Haters welcome. 😂
damn were you mad when he turned his back on you at that show
I don't know about him but i'm working on building a hype set.

when I swing in the mic
stretch
Maaan, I'm sorry you had to wait in the blistering cold for four hours just to hear no :(

Been there but it was blistering hot like the dread knots i used to rock,
as my haters hated me on every block,
only place i found love was with the kids posted on they spot,
loyal to the game, i knew not,
with their bologna sammiches for my stomach and my head tied up in knots
the hydro for my head the bruises they saw on my heart 
that feeling hit home like it dropped harder than my head of rocks.
didn't even know their names 
but it touched my heart just the same
like the sun felt after being released from the shame.
-Written on the spot by me, Rayv'n Volkano
Just full of myself today. What can I say? off to the goodwill, be blessed be bold an know yourself
Didn't mean to dry up the joke thread.
Can anyone flow on the spot anymore or no
Juvenile beats, house parties, lots of laughs and good times? Anyone remenber 1998 like that?
*raises own goofy white sausaged finger hand*  me!
Eminem drew a line yet still let's kid rock (trump supporter) on a track under his label....

No disrespect, but Where's the punch line Matt? I don't know you but if you are skilled in a trade or what have you, you may have known someone skilled you worked with that had opinions and beliefs different than yours,  but you didn't stop working with them because they had different political views, did you?
Or maybe you did? I don't know, but why bring it up?
Jessica Rayvn Woods Volk Eminems recent freestyle had a message but he's not holding true to that. You're special though for not seeing that. Good job.
